meanings: (정신이 이상해지다) go crazy[mad, insane], be[go] out of one's mind
(상식에서 벗어나다) be crazy, be[go] out of one's mind

meanings.meaning: There is method in his madness.

examples.korean: 40 degrees today? That’s crazy! I love warm weather, but that’s just insane. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 40도라고? 미쳤어! 따뜻한 날씨를 좋아하기는 하지만, 그건 그냥 제정신이 아닌 거야. DARAKWON
